spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Saemon is a 9th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). Saemon has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Magical Equipment
entries: Saemon wears a quiver of ehlonna.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Saemon makes three melee or ranged attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Saemon adds 4 to his AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so Saemon must see the attacker and be wielding a weapon.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: Saemon casts a cantrip from his spell list.

legendary.name: Animate Objects (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Saemon casts the spell animate objects, targeting hand axes that he has hurled at enemies up to a total of 10. If there are not enough hand axes to equal 10, then he provides the remaining hand axes from his quiver of ehlonna. The hand axes are considered tiny objects.
